name: A. Vadim s Collection
statement:
We call a phone number a if it is a string of 10 digits, where the i-th
digit from the left is at least 10 - i. That is, the first digit must be
at least 9, the second at least 8,
ldots, with the last digit being at least 0.For example, is a beautiful
phone number, while is not, since the second digit, which is 0, is less
than 8.Vadim has a phone number. He wants to rearrange its digits in
such a way that the result is the phone number. Help Vadim solve this
problem.Please note that the phone numbers are compared as integers.
